dict.string:
export TM_YEAR=`date +%Y` export TM_DATE=`date +%Y-%m-%d`
mkdir -p "$TM_NEW_FILE_DIRECTORY/stylesheets" mkdir -p "$TM_NEW_FILE_DIRECTORY/javascripts"
TM_RESET="$TM_NEW_FILE_DIRECTORY/stylesheets/reset-min.css" TM_CSS="$TM_NEW_FILE_DIRECTORY/stylesheets/main.css" TM_JS="$TM_NEW_FILE_DIRECTORY/javascripts/jquery.js"
if [[ ! (-f $TM_NEW_FILE) ]]; then perl -pe 's/\$\{([^}]*)\}/$ENV{$1}/g' <index.html >"$TM_NEW_FILE" fi
if [[ ! (-f $TM_RESET) ]]; then perl -pe 's/\$\{([^}]*)\}/$ENV{$1}/g' <reset-min.css >"$TM_RESET" fi
if [[ ! (-f $TM_CSS) ]]; then perl -pe 's/\$\{([^}]*)\}/$ENV{$1}/g' <main.css >"$TM_CSS" fi
if [[ ! (-f $TM_JS) ]]; then perl -pe 's/\$\{([^}]*)\}/$ENV{$1}/g' <jquery.js >"$TM_JS" fi
